OcclusionTestMethod: The method for deciding whether a triangle is occluded
TriangleSampling: Where to sample triangles to test occlusion
WindingIsoValue: The winding isovalue for GeneralizedWindingNumber mode
AddRandomRays: For raycast-based occlusion tests, optionally add random ray direction to increase the accuracy of the visibility sampling
AddTriangleSamples: Optionally add random samples to each triangle (in addition to those from TriangleSampling) to increase the accuracy of the visibility sampling
bOnlySelfOcclude: If false, when multiple meshes are selected the meshes can occlude each other.  When true, we process each selected mesh independently and only consider self-occlusions.
ShrinkRemoval: Shrink (erode) the boundary of the set of triangles to remove.
Action: What action to perform on occluded triangles
